attributes.action: The UK should recognises approved vaccinations administered in the Middle East.
attributes.additional_details: So that those of us who work & live in the Middle East can travel back to the UK to see our family’s without having to quarantine for 10 days
attributes.background: We request that the UK Government recognises approved vaccinations administered in the Middle East.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Recognise vaccine doses administered in foreign countries for Covid Pass
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592505
